31.1.2015 Vertainen: Olen keskustellut ilmoittajan kanssa Skypen kautta 4.12.2014. Lis√§tietoa tapauksesta:   
- Havaitsija kertoi, ett√§ kohde loisti hopeista valoa. V√§h√§n kuin aurinkoa olisi katsonut.

- Mainitsi my√∂s kokemastaan vahvasta l√§sn√§olon tunteesta. Eli h√§n oli kontaktissa "johonkin tuntemattomaan".

PS: en halunnut laittaa oikeaa puh numeroani, silla aikaeron vuoksi (8h) en halua mielellaan puheluja suomesta. Jos haluatte jutella, niin sovitaan vaikka skypelle.  
Olin nukkumassa, kello n. 2-4pm. Kuulin heratyskellon soivan, nousin ylos mutta en loytanyt pirinan lahdetta makuuhuoneesta. Menin parvekkeellee (ajattelin kannykan jaaneen ehka parvekkeen penkille), mitaan ei loytynyt. pirina jatkui kunnes huomasin kirkkaan valon viereisen tontin ylla (n. 12m minusta, katulampun korkeudella). 
Tuntui etta siella oli joku/ joitain. Kirkas valo naytti valilla yhdelta pallolta, valilla kolmelta erilliselta. Tuntui, etta minulta kysyttiin haluanko "tavata", mutta sitten minua alkoi jannittaa/ pelottaa ja ajattelin palata koirani kanssa kanssa takaisin nukkumaan. Ajattelin etta ehka sitten ensi kerralla.  
Makuuhuoneeseen palattuani valo nakyi edelleen, mutta loittoni jo. Heratin mieheni, joka kompi ylos niin hitaasti ettei ehtinyt nahda mitaan. Selitin koko jutun miehelleni, ja aamulla han muisti minun kertomat tapahtumat.
column20: Aiemmin, 2013 naimme mieheni kanssa vieresiten vuorten paalla 2-3 kpl vaaleita lentavia esineita, jotka poistuivat nakyvista. n. 3-4km paassa, omalta parvekkeeltamme - mieheni sanoi etta ehka ne oli ufoja, tai  sitten ne oli valkoisia lintuja ja aurinko teki teppposet. Niin, ja sitten ne "haju havainnot": voimakkaita, miellyttavia tuoksuja taalla kotona ja tuuntuu kuin joku olisi paikalla - ehka tuollainen vahemman fyysinen/ suora kontakti sopii minulle paremmin.

T√§st√§ syyst√§ Asko ei tuolloin 9/2009 viel√§ muistanut tapausta selke√§sti, vaan vasta vuoden 2010 lopulla. T√§st√§ johtuen tapaukseen tulee nyt runsaasti korjaavia ja t√§ydent√§vi√§ tietoja:

(Esiintyik√∂ s√§hk√∂laitteissa h√§iri√∂it√§: kyll√§.)

Tapaukseen liittyy muistikatko, sill√§ heti havainnon j√§lkeen molemmat olivat paniikissa ja peloissaan. Sitten seuraa muistikatko. Ja seuraava muistikuva on, ett√§ molemmat ovat menossa kaikessa rauhassa nukkumaan, ja nukahtavatkin heti. Kokijoiden mielest√§ t√§m√§ muistikatko, ja yll√§tt√§v√§ rauhaisa nukkumaan meno on eritt√§in outo ja ahdistavakin asia. Eih√§n kaksi paniikissa olevaa ihmist√§ voi noin vain nukahtaa!?

- Talvella 2012 havaitsijat k√§viv√§t tapahtumapaikalla. Asko kertoi, ett√§ paikalla alkoi ahdistamaan, ja syd√§n hakkaamaan nopeasti.    
Ufotutkija 166:n Arvio tapauksesta: En l√§hde arvailemaan luonnollisia selityksi√§. Mielest√§ni t√§m√§ j√§√§ selke√§ksi ufoilmi√∂ksi, jossa kaksi havaitsijaa tukevat toistensa havaintoja. Mukana on paljon tyypillisi√§ muissakin ufotapauksissa esiintulleita seikkoja.

"Hi Bj√∂rn,    
Thank you for your email. Our velomobiles are produced in Europe and we have no extraterrestrial connections. However, your message concerns us. There is only about 20 velomobiles in Finland, and most velomobile pilots know each other. At the time the observation was made, only two velomobiles would have been present in the Espoo area, none of them being white.  
Several velomobile pilots have informed us about other "velomobiles" which have been visible for only a very short time, as if it came to quickly check the human-driven velomobile, to then disappear with an elegance resembling hovering/flying rather than driving on wheels. In some cases they have made use of the bike roads, but observations have usually been quite vague.   
Due to the shape of the vehicle, velomobiles make a distinct, low rumbling sound when driving. If this sound can not be observed, something might be going on.   
Please keep us updated about similar observations, we will do the same to you.   
Kind regards,   
Pieter Deleu,  
VeloCraft "

" X  
Hello X   
Honestly in do not have direct answer for you, but some guesswork:   
- Was the sky cloudy?   
Normally in November it is and in the same time humidity is also high.   
- Was the lake still open (no ice)   
That will bring out more humidity and water was also warmer than air.   
- Answer:   
Conditions were good for halo effect"s. Reason for that could be lights of  
some car or Moon etc.   
Sometimes these halo effects could bring out very exciting"s and  freaks  
phenomenon"s.   
You can view yourself some cases:   
http://www.google.fi/search?q=haloilmi%C3%B6&hl=fi&tbm=isch&tbo=u&source=univ&sa=X&ei=DEMmUYq9POT_4QS1zIC4Ag&ved=0CDQQsAQ&biw=1280&bih=851

J-P Teitto   
Hei Jukka, kiitos oikein paljon vastausta   
HI, i had a look at the halo photographs and light phenomenon, they are  
beautiful light effects, but im afraid dont come near to explaining what we  
saw, in brief, three water tower shaped objects ,illuminated with  
individual rows of individual lights, they looked like water tower shaped  
disco balls,  but the rows of lights were linear , and following the  
classic water tower funnel shape, in other words, and please dont laugh,  
they looked like spaceships from a sciencefiction movie, what they were I  
dont know,  what they were not , I do know. Anyway, I know your concerns  
are of a more cosmological nature, and there is no roof without photos, im  
left to think about the misfortune of not having a camera to take photos,  
it could have provided an answer to what we saw, or they could Have been  
the most sensational photos of this publicly ridiculed phenomenon.  
I have no reason to exaggerate the sighting, and in a way, wish i had not  
seen these things.  
Its hard not to be a subject of ridicule when one says " i seen something"  
but like i say, just for future reference,  i would keep a memo of this  
e-mail.  
I myself,as a lover of science, an athiest, and a sceptic of everything  
that isnot backed up by scientific evidence or hard proof,  
To finish, maybe we were in the right place at the right time, who knows...  
I thank you for your prompt reply and hope a satisfying answer might yet be  
found   
Sincerely, X.

live in Tampere, and I would at least be very happy to answer any further

Heid√§n koirat lakkasivat my√∂s haukkumasta ja hypp√§siv√§t my√∂s veteen 1. kohteen nousun aikana. T√§m√§n j√§lkeen oli 2-3 min pime√§√§, kunnes ensimm√§isen kohteen havaintopaikalta heti vastarannan puiden takaa nousi kuin maan sis√§st√§ nousten ensimm√§isen kohteen kanssa kooltaan ja n√§√∂lt√§√§n identtinen kohde samalla tavoin n. 2min nousten ja h√§ipyen. T√§m√§n j√§lkeen oli n. 5min pime√§√§ ja samasta kohdasta maasta nousi viel√§ kolmas identtinen kahden ensimm√§isen kanssa ollut kohde h√§ipyen samoin paitsi, ett√§ sen nousu kallistui etel√§√§n eli havaitsijasta vasempaan p√§in. N√§iden j√§lkeen paikalle lensi n. 20-30min kuluttua oikealta vasemmalle eli mahdollisesti Pirkkalasta moottorillinen pienkone ainoana n√§kyv√§n√§ kohteena. Havaitsijalle tuli tunne koneesta, ett√§ jostain oli l√§hetetty kone katsomaan mit√§ oikein paikalla tapahtui. Koneen saapumisaikaa h√§n ei kuitenkaan katsonut vaan arvioi sen n. puoleksi y√∂ksi ja t√§m√§n j√§lkeen he meniv√§t eritt√§in v√§synein√§ nukkumaan. H√§nen tytt√∂yst√§v√§ns√§ varmentaa kertomuksen mutta h√§n kertoi, ett√§ h√§n tarvitsee mm. ajaessaan kaukolasit, joita h√§nell√§ ei ollut laiturilla tapahtumajaksolla p√§√§ss√§√§n. column12:
Hi, 
My Name is X, My friend introduced me to the fufora site, i would like 
to make a statement about an incident that happened on the second wednesday 
of november last year, I was with my girlfriend, and she witnessed the same 
phenomena as myself. 
I wrote to the finnish astrological society, but obviously wrote to the 
wrong place, as they were not interested in documenting the events. 
I claim only that the ufo which we seen was just that, and i at this stage 
will not use any other terms to describe the objects. 
I forward you the following transcript of what i wrote to the finnsih 
astrological society, the transcript is as follows, my e-mail, their 
answer, my response to their answer. 
Hi there jukka pekka, 
my name is X, and ive been living in finland for over six years. 
I speak and write finnish but my keyboard is the english type and doesnt 
have the charaters in finnish. 
Anyway, to get to the point, last year in november my girlfreind if she is 
to be believed posted on your website at my request a vivid description of 
a ufo,or in fact three of them that we seen from close quarters back 
in november 
last year. I thought myself that if someone in your offices looks at the emails 
that we would have been contacted to give more information, i am writing to 
you now about the incident, because i believe it is worth documenting at 
the very least, i use the word ufo, not spaceship or flying saucer, as the 
objects are just that to me , flying dissapearing into thin air , soundless , 
illuminated , very big and silent. 
I certainly hope you dont get letters like this often, and as real as my 
children are lying in bed asleep now, i am telling the truth about what we 
saw, the "we" meaning me and my girlfreid, 
We were spending a quiet nite at the summer cottage with the dogs, before 
the winter set in, the 14 th of november on a wednesday last year, the 
incident took place in lempaalla somewhere, a remote place in the country 
side, and lasted for the duration of maybe fifteen minutes or so, i didnt 
have my phone with me,or camera as we left the cottage just to bring the 
dogs out so they could go to the toilet before we went to bed, which was 
around midnight or just before it. 
The cottage is situated rightbeside or near a lake, we walked to the lake  and 
were sitting on the dock, when i noticed to the end ot the lake on my left 
, what seemed to be an illuminated water tower, vesi torni, it was maybe 
fity metres in height and the same in width, my girlfreid said it seemed to 
be pulsing, i didnt notice this however, i asked her as she is familar with 
the area why is it illuminated so much, still thinking i was looking at a 
water tower, and to my astonishment she told me, "there is no vesi torni 
there". Just as she had said that it rose up to a height of around two hundred 
metres and hovered for a few moments and dissapered into thin air, no 
noise, but the dogs barked and acted very strange, and the surface of the 
lake rippled with little waves. 
two more of the same phenomena rose up , its seems from withing the earth 
and dissapeard before out eyes , we seen the outline really clearly, the 
lights,or illumination, it was bewildering, and for the following month i 
could talk of nothing else, the following day we both drew pictures of what 
we saw , and our pictures were identical to each other. 
I remember the evening very well and can recall in detail the events, which 
all in all lasted maybe fifteen minutes, a week later we tried to get to 
the site , but is inaccessable and remote, and one has to go through 
forest, we tried to eliminate possible causes of the phenomena, and think 
of causes, but alas we are left perplexed and without any plausible answer, 
i myself love physics and documentaries about our universe, and know how 
ridiculous the idea of some observers from another galaxy or dimension 
coming here is just two impossible, but yet, i havent been able to explain 
away what i saw, and hence ive been compelled to write to you, in the hope 
that this case be documented, I as is my girlfreind who is finnish , are 
more than welcome to answer any further question you might want to ask about 
the incident, 
yours honestly and sincerely, X.

On 2 October 2010 I was out watching the eastern sky. I had my camera on a tripod and took several pictures of the starry sky, when I suddenly saw a large, dark shadow appear out of nothing in Andromeda/Pisces and then moved in a straight path almost straight above me (towards south, about 80∞ altitude) towards west, where it got out of sight, i.e. it moved behind the roof of my house. 
At the moment of appearing, it showed up, disappeared again, reappeared and then started moving. This appearing - reappearing took less than a second. The entire observation took 7-8 seconds, which I estimated the next day using a stopwatch.
column13: disappeared behind the roof of my house direction west
column14: There is a pedestrian street light nearby the house that did not disturb when taking star pictures, nor in the observation of the ufo. Trees towards north and south. House direction west.

k√§y ilmi, ett√§ valaisintaideteos on ollut paikallaan jo ennen t√§t√§ havaintoa (10.9.2008). Sivulla seitsem√§n on keskell√§ kuva valaisintaideteoksesta. Lomakkeella tosiaan on ristiriitoja: Havaintop√§iv√§m√§√§r√§ksi ilmoitettu 15.11, mutta lomake allekirjoitettu 12.11. Lis√§ksi, jos havainto olisikin tehty 15.11, ei ilmoitettu kellonaika (noin 18.00) voi olla oikein, mik√§li havaintoaikaan on ollut kirkas p√§iv√§nvalo, kuten havaitsija muistaa.

30.6.2013 Ufoutkija 166 (Vertainen):   
Ilmoittajan kanssa olen helmikuussa 2013 jutellut puhelimessa, ja kysynyt havaintoon liittyen joitain tarkentavia yksityiskohtia. Seuraavassa yhteenveto tuon puhelinhaastattelun pohjalta:   
Lomakkeelle havaitsija on kirjoittanut:  
"Huomasin ett√§ nukuin p√§√§ toiseen suuntaan her√§tess√§ni kuin nukkumaan menness√§ni"

- Liidunvalkoinen valo t√§ytti huoneen lattiasta kattoon. Ei muista n√§hneens√§ varjojakaan huoneessa.   
- Ei n√§kynyt mit√§√§n yksityiskohtia valon l√§hteest√§ tai aiheuttajasta.     
Puhelinkeskusteluamme hankaloitti kuitenkin se, ett√§ en aivan kuullut kaikkea mit√§ h√§n sanoi (huono kentt√§ tms?), ja toisaalta ei tullut siin√§ keskustelun aikana mieleen kysy√§ aivan kaikkea olennaista. N√§ist√§ syist√§ p√§√§tin sitten ottaa havaitsijaan viel√§ uudestaan yhteytt√§ (ja yritin useita kertoja), mutta h√§n ei en√§√§ vastannutkaan (ei puhelimitse, eik√§ s√§hk√∂postitse).   
Hyv√§ olisi ollut viel√§ selvitt√§√§ esim. seuraavia seikkoja:  
Onko l√§hell√§ muita taloja? Miss√§ kerroksessa havaitsija nukkui? Oliko valo h√§ik√§isev√§√§? Olisiko t√§t√§ valoa voinut verrata mihink√§√§n tavanomaiseen valoon? (esim. aurinkoon, hyvin kirkkaaseen valaisimeen jossa valkoinen valo, salamaan tms.)   
Loppuarviointia siis on vaikea antaa, kun j√§√§ avoimia kysymyksi√§. N√§ill√§ tiedoilla taas on hyvin vaikea arvioida, mist√§ ilmi√∂ olisi voinut aiheutua.

column12: I was standing out on our porch enjoying a cig, when I noticed what I thought was a lonely cloud in the sky hovering to the south west. I went in to fetch my camera, since it looked interesting enough to be photographed and I told my girlfriend that I was going to take a few shots of a really cute little cloud I was witnessing. The sky was completely clear in the area of the cloud, and I thought it cool; I was in a hurry to get my camera, so the cloud would not disperse. When I came back out, the cloud had not at all dispersed, but remained intact and in the same shape as when I left it. I started taking several photographs of the object as it "sailed" slowly to the west. The sky was clear, only displaying some light cloud formations far to the south, but nothing in the area of the object of my interest. I took photographs and studied the object as it continued its slow passage over the sky in the western direction. A light, cold, wind came in from the north. I stopped photographing when the object disappeared from my view behind the tree tops. During all this time it did not change shape, like a regular cloud, but indeed seemed solid. There was no sound of airplanes in the vicinity. the object seemed to be flying in the air about one or two kilometres from me, and when it disappeared behind the trees it was far away, leading me to believe that it was no small balloon or anything in that category. I know of no military excercises or hellicopter flights being arranged in my area at the time of the sighting either. The object seemed silent and I heard no sound of it. The sun was up to the south and seemed to shed its northern European winter light on the object. I took a whole series of photos of the object as it flew over the sky; with different zoom levels and I included parts of the terrain and surroundings in some and the trees. There is also a telephone line showing in the photos which also shows the slow western travel of the object.

29.08.2011 Weston-Super-Mare,Marine Lake ja 24 Atlanticroad  valimaasto,klo 21.49 -22.10 Englannin aikaan.  
Pyorivia "pilven muotoisia" tasaisen pyoreita valoja tuossa Bristolin lahden ylapuolella Marine Lake nimisella alueella,leijui edestakaisin pyorivin liikkein. Iso musta aukko keskella ja paljon valopalloja ymparilla ...piirran myos kuvan ja naytan sitten kun tulen Suomeen....uskomatonta...oli allistyttava naky!!! mina ja Andrew nahtiin ko ilmio meidan ikkunasta. En tieda onko kukaan muu huomioinut, oli aika hiljaista ulkona silloin. Ilmio liikkui lannesta itaan ja takaisin pyorivin liikkein! Valot eivat tulleet maasta vaan pysyivat pallomaisina "pilvina". Kello oli 21.49 paikallista aikaa ja kesti noin 20 minuuttia..kun vertasin ilmiota omaan kateeni niin se oli reilusti 10 kertaa isompi ja niin lahella...otin kuvia mutta oli niin pimeaa ja kuvat nayttivat lahinna punaisilta. Laitoin digikameraan yokuvauksen. Enka onnistunut siina.

T√§m√§ on dramaattisin ufokokemukseni. En ole varma olenko aiemmin t√§st√§ raportoinut, mutta haluan nyt varmistaa. Kerron mahdollisimman paljon yksityiskohtia. Tarkka paikka on kohdassa kalliolla, jonka luona on jonkinlainen laituri jossa ponnahduslauta (ainakin tuolloin). Ihmisi√§ koko alue t√§ynn√§, my√∂s t√§ll√§ kalliolla, olihan kuuma uimap√§iv√§. Mukanani olivat √§itini ja pikkusiskoni, jotka my√∂skin n√§kiv√§t vuorenvarmasti tapauksen, √§itini ei tosin "suostu" muistamaan. Ehk√§ hypnoosissa? Siskostani en nyt ole ihan varma. 
Makoilimme siin√§, kun jotenkin tulin katsoneeksi pilvett√∂m√§lle taivaalle. Siin√§ kieppui jonkinlainen tumma alus hitaasti ja rauhallisesti ylitsemme, koko saman kallion muidenkin ihmisten yli ja my√∂s koko muun uimarannan alueen kaikkien ihmisten yli. Joku viereisest√§ "√§ij√§porukasta" sanoi varmuudella, ett√§ "ovatko n√§m√§ nyt niit√§ ufoja Suomen taivaalla?", silloin samannimisen kirjan jo lukeneena muistan vuorenvarmasti t√§m√§n.  
Alus oli hyvin tumman harmaa, ellei aivan musta. Mattav√§rinen joka tapauksessa. Tummassa pinnassa oli vaaleita ellei aivan valkoisia pieni√§ merkint√∂j√§, jotka eiv√§t olleet mielest√§ni aakkosia, vaan joitain symboleja tai merkkej√§. Nyt kun asiaa mietin, tulevat mieleen jonkinlaiset laivojen syv√§ys- yms. runkoon maalatut symbolit. 
Aluksen rakenne oli varsin erikoinen. Ulkoisia ty√∂nt√∂voiman tuottajia ei ollut havaittavissa, ei siis mit√§√§n potkureita tai suihku- saati rakettimoottoreita, sit√§paitsi koko havainto oli t√§ysin √§√§net√∂n, ja liikehdint√§ oli aivan kuin vallinneen hitaan ja vienon tuulen mukana etenemist√§, miss√§ tapauksessa tavanomainen lentokone olisi v√§hint√§√§nkin sakannut. My√∂sk√§√§n mit√§√§n aerodynaamisia elementtej√§ ei ollut n√§kyviss√§, kuten nostovoimalaitteita kuten siipi√§ tai siivekkeit√§, tai ohjainpintoja. Pitkulainen putkimainen "p√§√§osa", jossa keskell√§ jonkinlainen putkimainen "torni", tosin sukellusveneeseen verrattuna ep√§suhtaisen lyhyell√§ "p√§√§osalla", ja sukellusvenett√§ pidin ja pid√§n yh√§ sulavamman muotoisena. 
Merkillist√§ ellei merkillisint√§ oli aluksen liikehdint√§ sen rauhallisen ohilentonsa aikana. Alus siis kieppui, joka akselinsa ymp√§ri, aivan holtittomasti mielest√§ni, tosin rauhallisesti. Itse omilla silmill√§ni, sen aikaisen ja nykyisenkin ilmailutekniikan, ja muunkin, tiet√§myksell√§ tapaus on arvoituksellinen.

My√∂sk√§√§n karkuun p√§√§ssyt kaasupullo, ei liioin kiepu, oikeastaan nouse maasta ollenkaan, ei "tornia" my√∂sk√§√§n. Ent√§ ne merkinn√§t? Aluksen koosta, siis vaikkapa "p√§√§osan" pituudesta on vaikea sanoa. column12: On September 15, 2015 at 12:30 at night, I saw first a boomerang shaped craft flying from zenith towards the west it was black with glowing outline, and appeared to have electrical field lines from aft of craft. Seconds after it flew out of sight, a second disk shaped craft appeared west of me at about 500 meters distant. It had a triangular opening on its side from which a green funnel of light emerged and was sweeping the ground below it. The funnel focused on me, and the craft moved closer, approx. 200 meters from me. A yellow beam of light then shot from the craft and hit me in the eyes, causing me to turn away. When I looked at the disk again, it slowly flew to the north, over a lake and shimmered in the atmosphere and turned into two disks and flew away. The total time of the sighting was about 20-30 seconds. All the crafts were totally silent.There was a sort of mist surrounding the disk and I could only see the details I mentioned.
